Html: I just downloaded the most recent version of the Mac software and ran the 84Plus Rom. When I click on the "On" key nothing happens, but when I click on the "9" key, the "1" key gets pressed. I loaded the sam ROM on my Windows 10 VM and the key presses are hitting exactly where they should. Any thoughts on this?

The problem is related to HiDPI in MacOS. It should be easily solvable by opening the info pane for the Wabbitemu.app file (two-finger or ctrl+click Wabbitemu.app and select "Get Info") and checking the box for "Open in Low Resolution". Running Wabbitemu with this setting should fix the button misalignment you describe.
